title: Jinx, kalista, graves or cait
body: Jinx, kalista, graves or cait. Best for solo queue. Ty in advance

replies.body:
Jinx
Graves
Cait

In that order.

Dont play Kalista without a duo unless you are insanely good with her.

if you need an adc to be solid in lane and the enemies best tank is 1 or 2 bruisers cait will serve you well.

if the enemy if full of squishy targets  graves is the adc to burst them down fast.

if the enemy if full of heavy tanks  jinx  will shred them fast after she scales out of lane.

kalista is one that you usually need a duo partner to trust your game play.  her builds are versetile from single target crit to spread shot no crit.
Jinx is currently best ADC right now.

Jinx, 100%. She's good in literally every matchup. Supports can still swing the lane into a loss, but not as hard as with Graves.

http://i.imgur.com/TA1NHhU.png?1
